formattedAddress: 439 W 22nd St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 439 W 22nd St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: A perfect New York oasis! Feels like you are staying with friends :) A Garden in Chelsea is clean, the beds are comfortable and it is a peaceful place to spend time in between outings. A previous New Yorker, this is the quietest, most convenient to transport places I have stayed since moving away from the city. Although it was a bit chilly when we were there, the garden would be a priceless addition in Spring and Summer! Can't wait to stay again!

originalText.text: This is a wonderful apartment in a great neighbourhood.  The tree lined street is a refuge in itself.  Karen and Paul, the owners, are welcoming and friendly (and we mustn't forget Charlotte).  They are an endless source of helpful information, including recommendations for eating, all within a short walk.  We stayed here for 11 nights and quickly appreciated the comfort of the apartment, it's quietness and its facilities, including access to the tranquil garden, most welcome for sitting in with a cup of tea in the morning to plan the day and then, yet more tea, at the end of a busy day. The apartment was perfect for all that we needed and unbelievably convenient for everything that we wanted to do.  Thank you very much from Julia and me.

originalText.text: A quiet respite with everything we needed and more. We lucked out finding this gorgeous place on our first trip to NY with our teenage son! Thank you Karen and Paul!

text.text: A quiet respite with everything we needed and more. We lucked out finding this gorgeous place on our first trip to NY with our teenage son! Thank you Karen and Paul!

originalText.text: My 14 year old daughter, 13 year old son and I had a fantastic experience staying in "A Garden in Chelsea." Everything about the apartment was perfect. We will definitely be staying here again.

text.text: My 14 year old daughter, 13 year old son and I had a fantastic experience staying in "A Garden in Chelsea." Everything about the apartment was perfect. We will definitely be staying here again.

originalText.text: I love this apartment! I recently stayed in the one bedroom apartment on the third floor for four months while I was in NYC for a project. Karen and Paul couldn't have been better hosts. They are kind, responsive, and know so much about the area as they've lived there for decades. The bedroom is away from the street so it's very quiet and the living room is large with a nice  desk to work at and a beautiful piano. The kitchen had everything I needed. It's walking distance to the High Line, Chelsea Piers, Chelsea Market, Hudson Yards, and lots of great restaurants. Can't recommend it enough! Five stars :)
